title: The Trump administration notified Congress in advance of the Iran strikes.
summary_full: The notification stood in contrast to past military actions President Trump has undertaken unilaterally without consulting with Congress, drawing bipartisan anger.
summary_public: The notification stood in contrast to past military actions President Trump has undertaken unilaterally without consulting with Congress, drawing bipartisan anger.

IR.label: neutral
IR.evidence: The Trump administration notified Congress in advance of the Iran strikes.
